title: Stefanini Group Acquires Cyber Smart Defense to Bolster Global Cybersecurity Portfolio, Better Serve Clients
summary: SOUTHFIELD, Mich.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- #Cybersecurity--Stefanini Group, a $1 billion global technology company specializing in digital solutions, announced today the initiation of its merger with Cyber Smart Defense, a Romanian cybersecurity company, which will enable Stefanini to strengthen its cybersecurity capabilities in Europe. Effective today, Stefanini Group will acquire 100% of Cyber Smart Defenses Romanian operations, solidifying a partnership that began in 2020. "The Cyber Smart Defense acquisition is
